name: Kuri
description:
Kuri is a challenging 2d side-scroller in which you  play as an inexperienced knight attempting to get  the sacred Kuri Stone. It was stolen from the Kuri Empire by an Evil Dragon King and a wizard draped in black,you will travel to different areas collecting the Sacred Keys and obtain different swords while leveling up to become more powerful.

the Kuri Empire's fate is in your hands! 

Do you have what it takes to destroy the Evil that is at hand??

Or will you fail in the process?

this Game Supports Xbox One Controller

The Demo is only 10minutes  long please enjoy .

Android Demo will be included!

How To Play

Move left - left arrow key
Move Right --- RIght Arrow Key
(In Over World) Move Up --- Up Arrow Key
(In Over World) Move Down --- Down Arrow Key
Attack ---- Z Key
Block --- X key
Jump --- C key
Weapons Menu ---- Spacebar(held down)
Stats Menu/Pause-----Enter Key
Quit Game ----------Esc Key
Mouse Movement /Left button (selecting weapons)

Xbox One Controller

Move left - left stick left
Move Right --- left stick right
(In Over World) Move Up --- leftstick up
(In Over World) Move Down --- leftstick down
Attack ---- X button
Block --- B button
Jump --- A button
Heal----- Y button
Weapons Menu ---- Menu Button
Stats Menu/Pause---- Start button
Quit Game ---------- N/A
Selecting Weapons--------- Rightstick

Game auto saves in overworld!

Rate Leave Feedback i would like to hear you all opinions :)

Tips and Tricks 
 Tip # 1: Do not use the basic Sword... Unless you are very skilled...You will die!

 Tip # 2: Defense is everything. Block any chance you can get. Be aware if you block 
to much you might get pushed of the stage.

 Tip# 3: If your blocking an enemy, You can run in the opposite direction
to get some distance between the enemy and you! At that point You have an Advantage to strike!

 Tip# 4: If you Strike an enemy he will lunge forward at you. Think before Striking.
